resources.name: TraceLink Opus Platform APIs
resources.description: Communicate with the Opus platform using a set of parameterized requests designed to help you create, edit, view, and submit different types of incidents and business requests.

resources.name: Task Template Management
resources.description: Add, edit, and copy task templates and manage the associated template sub-tasks.

resources.name: Task Management
resources.description: Add, edit, and copy task templates and manage the associated template sub-tasks.

resources.name: Master Data Queries
resources.description: The Master Data Manager app allows customers to manage their Company, Company Location, Partner, Partner Location and Product information. This Master Data is used by all sorts of applications provided by TraceLink on TTS (SOM, SNM, Government Reporting) and Opus (APT, Government Reporting, etc).

resources.name: Incident Management
resources.description: Incident process APIs enable Suppliers, Manufacturers, CMOs, CPOs, 3PLs, and Repackagers to manage, track, and close a variety of issues and disruptions that occur throughout the supply chain.

resources.name: Get activity history for an incident
Edit a comment for an incident
Submit an External Manufacturing Incident to partner
External Manufacturing Incident
resources.description: Add, update, and resolve external manufacturing incidents (i.e. incidents involving providers of contract manufacturing and packaging services for APIs, bulk, and finished goods).

resources.name: Get activity history for an External Manufacturing Incident
List comments for an External Manufacturing Incident
Add a comment to an External Manufacturing Incident
Read details of an External Manufacturing Incident
Edit Comment on an External Manufacturing Incident
Create a new External Manufacturing Incident
Document Review Process
resources.description: Document review process APIs enable supplier relationship managers, quality compliance managers, and manufacturing plant managers at companies that own or link to Agile Process Teams to manage, track, and complete document reviews.

resources.name: Get Activity History for Document Review
Get the activity history for a Direct Supplier Incident
Direct Supplier Incident
resources.description: Add, update, and resolve direct supply incidents (i.e. incidents involving providers of raw materials, components, and services related to manufacturing of products).

resources.name: Submit a Direct Supplier Incident to partner
List comments for a Direct Supplier Incident
Add a comment to a Direct Supplier Incident
Read the details of a Direct Supplier Incident
Edit an existing Direct Supplier Incident
Create a new Direct Supplier Incident
Get activity history for an existing Compliance Exception Incident
Compliance Exception Incident
resources.description: Add, update, and resolve supply chain compliance exception incidents on the Owner's network.

Change Request Management
resources.description: Add, evaluate, and implement process change requests with their internal locations and external Partners on the network.
